text: lqd kan lkm- 'ayuha almwmnwn- fi 'iibrahim ealayh alslam waladhin maeah qudwatan hamidat liman yatmae fi alkhayr min allah fi aldunya walakhrt, waman yuerid eamaa ndbh allah 'iilayh min altasy banbyayh, wywal 'aeda'an allh, fa'iina allah hu alghny ean ebadh, alhamid fi dhatih wsfath, almhmwd ealaa kl hal
